contentTypes.name: Guideline
contentTypes.description: A content type to manage the component guidelines.

contentTypes.name: Content_Basic
contentTypes.description: A content type to manage detailed content blocks within sections.

contentTypes.name: Section_Rules
contentTypes.description: A Section to manage Do & Don't rules

contentTypes.name: Content_Rules
contentTypes.description: Manage Do & Don't content blocks within RuleSection.

contentTypes.name: Section_Usage
contentTypes.description: Describe the usage of the component

contentTypes.name: Section_Anatomy
contentTypes.description: Showcase the anatomy of the component

contentTypes.name: Section_Variant
contentTypes.description: Provide the variant options for the component

contentTypes.name: Section_Behaviour
contentTypes.description: Describe the behaviour of the component

contentTypes.name: Organisation
contentTypes.description: The Organisation content type is used to define the global settings for the organisation. This includes the main heading, logo, theme color, and references to the various guidelines that are applicable across the application. These settings provide a consistent look and feel and are used across multiple components such as the header and introduction sections.
